content.prompt: The structures that comprise the ancient site of Nan Madol were built by

choices.label: binding layers of irregularly shaped boulders together with mortar
stacking natural basalt columns in an intersecting pattern
arranging precisely cut stone blocks into a seamless masonry wall
using a type of concrete made from local sand and volcanic ash

topic.text: 9.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
